overview:
Thod Nguyen is currently Chief Technology Officer (CTO) at eHarmony.com. Thod brings with him over 15 years of extensive experience in building and leading high-performance professional technology teams and operations in industries including social networking, ecommerce and the Web. At eHarmony, Thod is responsible for overseeing and leading the technical development, innovation, operation and growth of the company.

Thod previously served as CTO at MyLife.com where he was responsible for providing technology strategy, team building, technical leadership and overseeing Agile Project Management, Engineering, Infrastructure, and QA teams.

Prior to joining Mylife, Thod has led all technology efforts as CTO at a few social network startups and spent 8 years leading, and developing innovative Internet enterprise solutions as Chief Software Architect of United Online whose brand include Classmates, MyPoints, FTD and NetZero. In addition, Thod holds a patent on Web Acceleration.

Prior to United Online, Thod was a Lead Software Engineer at SUN MicroSystems (SeeBeyond) and Senior Software Engineer at GE Harris.

degrees.degree_type: Bachelor in Electrical Engineering and Computer Science
